title: Update checkout BTC payment address to new hardcoded value

requirements.summary: Replace the hardcoded BTC payment address used during checkout so new orders store and display the new address across checkout success and order status views.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx, the fixed `btcAddress` value used when submitting `createOrder` is changed to `12usSpmU49fnNfm7VuoGkvkoT47jS5snri`.
After placing a new order, the checkout success screen’s “Bitcoin Address” field shows `12usSpmU49fnNfm7VuoGkvkoT47jS5snri`.
For a newly created order, the order status page shows the same updated BTC address (as stored on the order).

file_operations.description: Update the hardcoded `btcAddress` constant used to create orders from the old `1A1...` value to `12usSpmU49fnNfm7VuoGkvkoT47jS5snri`, ensuring the value passed as `btcPaymentAddress` to `useCreateOrder().mutateAsync(...)` and the captured `orderSnapshot.btcAddress` are the new address.
